name: Fistful of Rogue
description:
A western themed top-down shooter roguelike game made for the 7DRL challenge 2022. 

Controls:

Movement - WASD | Gamepad Right Stick

Aim - Mouse | Gamepad Left Stick

Shoot Left Weapon - Left Mouse Button | Gamepad Left Trigger

Shoot Right Weapon - Right Mouse Button | Gamepad Right Trigger

Pick Up / Swap Weapon Right - Q | Gamepad Left Shoulder Button

Pick Up / Swap Weapon Right - E | Gamepad Right Shoulder Button

Interact - Space | Gamepad Face Button Bottom

Pause - Esc | Gamepad Pause Button
